product_name: The North Face Super Diez Down Jacket - Women's
long_description: The North Face Super Diez women's jacket is filled with premium 900-fill-power goose down for toasty warmth with minimal weight. It skimps on bulkiness, but not on durability or warmth! Constructed with highly durable 10-denier nylon Pertex(R) fabric, this material is extremely svelte and stands up to rugged surfaces. Premium 900-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Slim baffles enhance warmth, keeping down from shifting to eliminate cold spots throughout the jacket. Elastic-bound cuffs and hideaway hem drawcord. The North Face Super Diez jacket has zip handwarmer pockets; jacket stows in hand pocket.
short_description: The North Face Super Diez women's jacket is filled with premium 900-fill-power goose down for toasty warmth with minimal weight. It skimps on bulkiness, but not on durability or warmth!
